events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review your credentials shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on your experience and skills in software development.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your profile to guide you through the interview process for the software engineer role.
We conducted an initial screening call to discuss your background and technical expertise in software engineering.
You responded promptly expressing enthusiasm and readiness to proceed with the next steps in the interview process.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 20th, where you will solve coding challenges and discuss system design.
You successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong coding skills and problem-solving abilities.
The HR interview has been scheduled for May 25th to discuss cultural fit, work preferences, and company benefits.
